operation.name: insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO full_cut_activity (id, activity_name, description, begin_time, end_time, status, gysid, create_time, create_adminid,examine_time,examine_adminid) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

operation.name: selectByGysid
operation.sqlmap:
${cdata-start} select * from full_cut_activity where 1=1 ${cdata-end} <dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="status" prepend="and"> status=#status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="keyword" prepend="and"> activity_name like '%$keyword$%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="gysid" prepend="and"> gysid=#gysid#</isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="Time" prepend="and"> DATE(end_time) >= #Time# and #Time# >= DATE(begin_time)</isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
order by create_time desc

operation.name: upStatusById
operation.sql: update full_cut_activity set status=?,examine_time=?,examine_adminid=? where id=?

operation.name: selectByID
operation.sql: select * from full_cut_activity where id=? and gysid=?

operation.name: updateById
operation.sql: update full_cut_activity set activity_name=?, description=?, begin_time=?, end_time=? where id=?

operation.name: selectForTime
operation.sqlmap: ${cdata-start} select * from full_cut_activity where status='1' ${cdata-end} <dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="gysid" prepend="and"> gysid=#gysid#</isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="Time" prepend="and"> date_format(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #Time# and #Time# >= date_format(begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d') </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
